data.title: About Us - Regent College London
data.meta_description: Regent is a diverse community, active in promoting learning and education, with over 20 years of success within UK higher education.
data.text:
We have multiple study centres around the city, including our Central London campus, providing 100,000 square feet of modern learning space. Each campus is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and a short walk from transport links.

We aim to give our students an exciting and inspirational student experience. You will be supported throughout your journey at Regent by a dedicated team of professionals who always put students first.

Regent College London is proud to have partnered with established universities to help students achieve the degree of their dreams. Each of the Foundation Degrees, Foundation Year Routes, Bachelor’s Degrees, Top-Up Degrees and Master’s Degrees we offer is validated and awarded by one of our partner institutions. Like us, they put students at the heart of everything they do.
